name: Justin.tv - No Ads & Streamlined

Last Updated @ 6:04am PST - IMPORTANT: AT THE VERY BEGINNING OF THE STYLE, LOOK FOR THE "REPLACE YOUR USERNAME" SECTION AND FOLLOW THE INSTRUCTIONS!!! If you're a frequent user of Justin.tv, you're well aware of all of the annoying ads and unnecessary crap that is common on the channel pages. This userstyle REMOVES ALL OF THE JUNK and streamlines the channel page into one uniform column! Check it out and let me know what you think!
